segments.text: Hi , welcome to Hal's Computer World . Can I help you with anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to buy a new computer , but I don't really know much about them . Can you give me any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . First of all , do you want to get a home computer or a laptop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they generally cost a little more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll just get a regular home computer then . I don't think I'll need to lug my computer around with me .
segments.speaker: S2
